table.name: vtiger_documentfolders
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_documentfolders` ( `documentfoldersid` int(11) NOT NULL, `documentfolders_no` varchar(56) default NULL, `foldername` varchar(255) default NULL, `sequence` int(11) NOT NULL, `parentfolder` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`documentfoldersid`), INDEX (`foldername`), INDEX (`parentfolder`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_documentfolderscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_documentfolderscf` ( `documentfoldersid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`documentfoldersid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
